attributes.action: Prevent the use of taxpayer pounds to pay the bonusses the bosses of G4S are now entitled to because they have failed.
attributes.additional_details: Bosses of large companies holding contracts with our present government are incentivised to fail because of the practice of our abysmal government ministers to pay huge rewards for failure.  They know they will end up with more money in their pockets - and will be protected from prosecution, by those same ministers -  if they cause the contract to fail.  This practice MUST be stopped.
